titleStmt.title: An answer to the dissenters pleas for separation, or, An abridgment of the London cases wherein the substance of those books is digested into one short and plain discourse.
titleStmt.author: Bennet, Thomas, 1673-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the University press, for Alexander Bosvile ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Thomas Bennet. cf. NUC pre-1956.
